mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, kana_name, nickname, email, area, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, #{deleted})
INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{studentId},#{courseName},#{startDate},#{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kana_name = #{kanaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, area = #{area}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
